The goal of the manuscript tool is to assist in writing scientific manuscripts.
It facilitates the creation of a Quarto project with a manuscript template
and offers additional functions.

## Installation

You can install the development version of manuscript like so:


```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.package("devtools")
devtools::install_github("gigu003/manuscript")
```


## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(manuscript)
## basic example code

```
